text: Joshua Jennifer Espinoza (born December 17, 1987) is an American poet from Riverside, California. Espinoza's works have been published in Poetry Magazine, PEN America, Lambda Literary, The Offing, Shabby Doll House, Electric Cereal, and Voicemail Poems. Espinoza's work covers topics like mental illness, coming out as a transgender woman, as well as more traditional subjects like love, anger, and beauty. == Bibliography == * i'm alive / it hurts / i love it.
